Enum OrientationSensor.SCREEN_ROTATION_MODE

  • Enclosing class:
    OrientationSensor

    public enum OrientationSensor.SCREEN_ROTATION_MODE

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FIXED_ORIENTATION
      Rotation disables.
      SENSOR_ALWAYS
      Rotate always.
      SENSOR_WHEN_ROTATION_ENABLED
      Rotate when the system wide display rotation flag is enabled.
